name: Squill
description: $SQUILL governs $OPEN, an equal-weight index tracking leading stablecoin-networks advancing transparency, composability, and user-led governance. Included protocols should be evaluated on verifiable asset-backing, peg design, mint/redeem logic, safety mechanisms, yield-sharing, and decentralized control. Vote-lock SQUILL to earn fees and a voice in shaping the OPEN index: constituents, weights, and beyond.
